base_description: Metallic lighter, rectangular, silver, compact design.
part_description: Includes a hinged lid, rectangular body, and ignition wheel. The lid is positioned on top, the wheel is at the top front, and the body is the main structure.
internal_interaction_description: The hinged lid opens to reveal the ignition wheel and wick. The wheel, when spun, strikes a flint to produce a spark. This ignites the wick, allowing the lighter to produce a flame. The lid protects the internal components when closed.
external_interaction_description: Designed to be held in the hand, the lighter is used to produce a flame for lighting cigarettes or other items. It interacts with the user through manual operation of the lid and ignition wheel, and with external objects by providing a controlled flame.
